comment: I LOVE LOVE this Professor!  She is soooo interesting to listen to.  Great discussions in class.  would recommend.

She engages the classroom with some lecture and a PowerPoint used in the final, but she mostly wants the students input and stories about diversity in their lives. she is genuine and cares about her students becoming successful educators. a few papers, group assignment, 2 major essays based off field work and one fill in the blank final.
